input.sentences: a man poses with his parents .
this is a picture of a little boy .
this is a picture of a boy wearing green .
this is a picture of santa .
output.sentences: James has so many memories with his parents.
Like the time he was a kid opening his toy truck.
That was a great day for him.
He also fondly remembers seeing santa with his brother.
He and his brother have many great memories together.
